subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a person standing on the ground; compare {{l|zh|大}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[stand]]
# to [[erect]]
# to [[set up]]; to [[establish]]
# to [[institute]]; to [[lay down]]; to [[draw up]]; to [[compose]] (legal document)
# to [[exist]]; to [[live]]
# [[standing]]
# [[upright]]; [[vertical]]
# [[immediately]]; [[at once]]
